title: Chapter 2669: The Southern Region Has A Friend (3)

Chapter 2669: The Southern Region Has A Friend (3)

Chapter 2669: The Southern Region Has a Friend (3)

Editor: Nyoi-Bo Studio

“It’s nothing. I was trying out a little trick I just learned. It’s quite useful…”

Gou Wuyue was shocked.

What sort of method was this that it could control the body of Wei Feng, the God of Killing? Even if he had just woken up and was defenseless?

Dao Qiongcang promptly looked at Wei Feng and did not give him a chance to speak. He asked.

“Let’s go to the Southern Region?”

This turn of events was too sudden!

Wei Feng had just mentally processed the battle at the entrance of the Ran Ming ruins tunnel in his mind; this involved Xu Xiaoshou and the Holy Emperor Fengtian, Feng Yujin.

He hesitated for a moment, but didn’t ask further. He nodded and said.

“Alright.”

“Don’t agree too readily. A lot had happened while you were asleep.” Dao Qiongcang laughed.

“Alright…”

“It’s a big deal!” Dao Qiongcang’s tone became serious. “I’m no longer the Hallmaster.”

Wei Feng was slightly stunned when he heard this and glanced at Gou Wuyue.

He wasn’t stupid. When he saw that even the former Ruler of the white-robed people had been taken out of the Dead Sea by Dao Qiongcang, he knew that many events had happened recently.

But no matter how big the matter was, as long as Dao Qiongcang was around, he did not need to think about the past and future.

This was the far-reaching consequence of having served as the Third Emperor in the Sacred Mountain Gui Zhe for many years.

He didn’t trust anyone else, but he could always trust Dao Qiongcang.

After all, his failure to intercept Xu Xiaoshou had a huge impact on him, and up until now, Dao Qiongcang had never mentioned it.

If there was an invitation, he would just accept it.

Was anything else important?

“Alright.”

When Wei Feng did not ask any questions and agreed readily for the third time, Gou Wuyue couldn’t help but sigh deeply.

Elder Dao the Flamboyant was too terrifying.

He had been in power at the Sacred Mountain for more than 30 years. On the surface and in the dark, the branding he left behind was too deep.

His departure wasn’t as insignificant as the loss of a stone or that of a withered flower at the Sacred Mountain Gui Zhe.

It was even possible that half of the sky on the Sacred Mountain would fall along with it!

“We’ll go to the Southern Region and start from scratch?”

Gou Wuyue looked intently at Elder Dao who was deep in thought and asked indirectly.

Wei Feng also glanced at him from the side. He had never considered the Southern Region as an option before.

However, his home was not the Holy Divine Palace. It did not matter where he went, it would be the same.

“It’s not a zero possibility, but there’s a chance.” Dao Qiongcang shook his head.

“Oh? You have people in the Southern Region, or have you made arrangements?” Gou Wuyue showed just the right amount of curiosity.

Dao Qiongcang knew what he wanted to ask. He laughed lightly and said, “I know a very capable young man who had started from scratch. His background is clean and he has no criminal record. He has even laid a good foundation for us.”

“Who is it?” Gou Wuyue and Wei Feng said in unison.

“You guys have never heard of him. You won’t know even if I tell you…”

“Who is it?” They persisted.

“It’s a Divine secret, I can’t reveal it…”

“Dao Qiongcang! You brat!”

“Uh, alright. His name is Nangong Youshu.”

Qingyuan Mountain shattered.

The three Saints were sent flying.

The ghost beast Greedy the Cat Spirit seemed to know how to avoid self harm; it flexed its sharp claws as it stepped onto the void.

“Boom!”

It changed its direction and disappeared into the spatial fragment.

“Blood…”

“Flesh…”

“Hungry…”

Through the vague telepathic connection established by their long-term intimate relationship, the second true body read the desire in Greedy the Cat Spirit’s scarlet eyes at the last moment.

It wanted to devour flesh and blood!

It needed a lot of food!

It even had extremely high requirements for food ingredients. After all, it had swallowed so many types of Holy Medicine in the Apricot Realm…

In an instant, thousands of possibilities flashed through the second true body’s mind, and it quickly locked onto one.

“It is a place filled with a large number of ingredients rich in spiritual energy and has a large number of high-level flesh and blood. It can delay the feeling of hunger…”

“There’s only one place around here! ”

“Jade Capital City!”

But…

Was that a place where ghost beasts could enter?

The second true body turned to look at Ye Xiaotian, who still struggled to pull on his pants over his short legs, and shouted.

“Master Dean, stop it! Bring it back!”

Ah, such bad luck!

Xu Xiaoshou you’re really annoying!

Ye Xiaotian was so furious that he withdrew his legs into his internal world instantly. He twisted his upper body and pulled out the Power Upanishad Formation from his bloody intestines.

“Spatial transmission…”

However, he had only gathered half of his power. He wanted to move Greedy the Cat Spirit out of the spatial fragment.

With a whoosh, the thick mass of Holy Power suddenly disappeared.

“It had all been swallowed!”

“Xu Xiaoshou, what kind of monster did you release?!” Ye Xiaotian shouted anxiously.

What kind of ghost beast was this?

All of his spiritual techniques were useless!

It could even ignore the Spatial Upanishad and forcefully transform it into energy and swallow it. Wouldn’t Ye Xiaotian only be left with a five-foot-long body as fodder if he were to face this monster?

“I will give it a try.”

Mei Siren could tell that this matter was one of great urgency for Xu Xiaoshou. As soon as his sword image was activated, he used a different strategy with the Taicheng Sword and launched the Fantasy Sword Technique..

Amid the spatial fragment, plum blossoms drifted down in an attempt to divert Greedy the Cat Spirit and make it turn around.

Who would have thought that the monster would open its mouth and once again swallowed everything up.

With a sizzle, all of the plum blossoms formed from the Sword Will and morph forms of Sword Energy were swallowed.

The illusion that he had just started to outline disappeared completely.

Once the Fantasy Sword Technique was shattered, it would be powerless even to stop a chicken. How could it restrain the out of control Greedy the Cat Spirit?

“Ha…”

The Five Decays of Heaven and Man, who had long fled into the distance, shook his head and laughed.

If it could even swallow the Penetrating Divine Senses, how could it not swallow the sword energy and the Holy Power?

Only he knew how terrifying the Body of Devour was.

The only reason why he didn’t want to fight was because he had swallowed Ye Xiao on Abyss Island. What was the point?

Wasn’t it to not alert the Holy Divine Palace and not expose himself too early?

Now that the ghost beast had lost control, it could not learn to restrain itself at all. It was equivalent to unleashing 120% of the Body of Devour’s functionality.

It had also accumulated a large amount of medicinal power in its body. After it came out, it had even eaten high-level powers such as the God Punishment Tribulation and the spatial Holy Power and other high-level elites’ power…
